title: Beautiful Place
review: This place is a museum and houses fine and delicate sculptures of the region.This museum is home to sculptures that belong to Pushkar,Adhai-din ka Jhonpra,Baghera,Pisangan and Osian.In the museum are also displayed pre-historic relics and cast of seals with pictographs which were discovered at Mohanjodaro in the Indus Valley.

title: Average place
review: This place is similar to other place in the city. If you already been to other place then you may skip to go it.

title: Nice
review: Daulat khana is nice place for history lover. this is now government museum of mugal and rajput history.

title: beautiful and pollution free place
review: There are a tasty dish which you cannot expect. Very beautiful place and good view of stone and lake. This place is excellent for visiting and roaming. Pollution free city is also a big point of this place.

title: Daulat khana
review: Daulat khana is good historical place of Ajmer Rajasthan. Good place for visit to know about history.

title: An integral part of the interior
review: Tradition to place significant museum exhibitions in the old forts and palaces in India can be traced almost everywhere. Ajmer is not the exception. Moreover, the state Museum is housed in the Daulat Khana palace, which is located within the Fort. Perhaps this is correct and successful expedient for welcoming the visitors and giving them more opportunities to imagine the exhibits in an authentic atmosphere. Especially in such graceful  Daulat Khana Palace, designed and built with a delicate taste. Books, sculptures, weaponry and ammunition of those times look not as the foreign objects, but as an integral part of the interior.

title: Great...
review: If you love our history and you want to know more about it then this place is for you. Collection of many things related to mugals and rajputana are here.

title: Musuem for local history
review: Daulat Khana is the palace housing the Ajmer/Akbar Fort and Museum. The museum has artifacts and scriptures related Mughal and Rajputana history. The local history is depicted through various installations and gallery. Its well maintained and is one the few must visited places in Ajmer. Walking distance from railway station or take an auto to reach here

title: For history lovers
review: This place shows the mix culture of Mugal and Rajputana. The galleries are full of old painting and goods of that time.

title: For History Seekers
review: Daulat Khana is located on the way to Pushkar from Ajmer and has some great artifacts from the time of Rajputhana & Mughal era

title: Daulat Khana is a huge rectangular palace
review: Daulat Khana is a huge rectangular palace, which has now been converted into a Government Museum. The museum houses a large collection of Mughal and Rajput armoury apart from delicate sculptures of the region. The palace served as residence to the Mughal emperors Akbar and Jahangir, between 1613 and 1616, during their visit to the Dargah Sharif.
